description: Total number of statements executed
Total number of execution errors
Current number of connections in TiDB server
Total number of handled queries in server
Sum of handled query duration in server
The number of current connection
The number of active connection
The number of clients disconnected
A time model statistic that is the sum of all process' CPU consumption plus the sum of non-idle wait time.
The number of SQL statements executed per second on all TiDB instances, which is counted according to SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and other types of statements
The statistics of error types (such as syntax errors and primary key conflicts) according to the errors occurred when executing SQL statements per second on each TiDB instance.
The number of commands processed by TiDB per second, which is classified according to the success or failure of command execution results
The statistics of queries using Plan Cache per second. The execution plan cache only supports the prepared statement command. If the value is 0, the execution plan cache has not been hit.
The duration between the time that the client's network request is sent to TiDB and the time that the request is returned to the client after TiDB has executed it.
The number of transactions executed per second
Disk usage bytes of TiKV/TiFlash instances
Disk capacity bytes of TiKV/TiFlash instances
Sum of CPU usage seconds of TiDB/TiKV/TiFlash instances
CPU limit cores of TiDB/TiKV/TiFlash instances
Resident memory bytes of TiDB/TiKV/TiFlash instances
Memory limit bytes of TiDB/TiKV/TiFlash instances
